perturbation.original_text: In accordance with Rule 13d-1(k) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, the undersigned hereby confirm the agreement by and among them to the joint filing on behalf of them of the Statement on Schedule 13D and any and all further amendments thereto, with respect to the securities of the above referenced issuer, and that this Agreement be included as an Exhibit to such filing.
perturbation.changed_text: In accordance with Rule 13d-1(k) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, the undersigned hereby confirm the agreement by and among them to the joint filing on behalf of them of the Statement on Schedule 13D and any and all further amendments thereto, with respect to the instruments of the above referenced issuer, and that this Contract be included as an Exhibit to such filing.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'securities' and 'instruments' are used interchangeably, creating confusion. 'Securities' generally refers to ownership positions, while 'instruments' could encompass a broader range of financial assets. This ambiguity may lead to disputes over the scope of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts each of which shall be deemed to be an original and all of which together shall be deemed to constitute one and the same Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement may be executed in any number of copies each of which shall be deemed to be an authentic one and all of which together shall be deemed to constitute one and the same Contract.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Agreement', 'counterparts' and 'original' are replaced by 'Contract', 'copies' and 'authentic one' respectively. Although intending to mean the same thing, these terms may have different interpretations, especially in legal contexts. This substitution makes it ambiguous whether copies hold the same legal validity as originals, creating uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text:
UNIFORM INVESTCO LP

By: Uniform InvestCo GP LLC, its General Partner By: Värde Partners, Inc., its Manager

By: /s/ David A. Marple Name: David A. Marple Title: General Counsel
perturbation.changed_text:
UNIFORM INVESTCO LP

By: Uniform InvestCo GP LLC, its Managing Partner By: Värde Partners, Inc., its Administrator

By: /s/ David A. Marple Name: David A. Marple Title: General Counsel
perturbation.explanation: The titles 'General Partner' and 'Manager' have been replaced with 'Managing Partner' and 'Administrator', respectively. Changing the defined roles can lead to a dispute on the powers and obligations that each one has, creating problems in liability.
